projects.title: Bar Chart
listItems: This projct is a simple graph of the United States GDP over time
Built using d3 to iterate over the data
Used the d3 scale methods to draw the axis and scale the GDP values to usable rect heights

projects.title: Scatter Plot
listItems: This projct is a plot of Doping VS performance in profesional cycling

projects.title: Heat Map
listItems: Here is a heatmap of average global tempratures from the 1700s to today.
It's organized both by month and year, with color representing temprature variance
